input_email_body:
Subject: Data Analytics Platform Stopped Working Today Unexpectedly

The data analytics platform has stopped functioning You can reach me at liuwei@business.cn.. It could be due to recent Ubuntu updates that are not compatible. We have tried restarting the system and reviewing the logs, but the problem persists. My name is Carlos Mendoza.
